New Records: Virat Kohli hit his 31st T20I fifty, equaling Rohit Sharma's record for the most fifty-plus scores in T20I cricket
Key Match Events: Kohli and Suryakumar Yadav stitched a 98-run partnership in just 7 overs as India scored 192 for 2 against Hong Kong
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kohli's 31st fifty marked his first T20I fifty since the home series against West Indies in February
